response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,000,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to making such a valuable asset accessible to someone who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exceptional offer.", "product_price": 950000}
